info.description: Provide information associated with an IP that allows the execution of response actions against fraud.
info.title: IPs Information API

get.summary: Get and validate information about an IP address

parameters.name: ip
parameters.description: A valid IP address V4 or V6

200.description: Returns info related to the IP Address

400.description: \"ip\" must be a valid ip address of one of the following versions [ipv4,ipv6] with a forbidden CIDR
